entities.name: snape
entities.description: Snape is described as having a thin, sallow face and wearing an expression of loathing every time he sees Harry. He wanted the Defense Against the Dark Arts job.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is described as knowing Snape's expression well and being startled by it. He hated Snape but was also surprised by his reaction to not getting the job.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is introducing new appointments and announcing Professor Kettleburn's retirement and Hagrid's new teaching job.

entities.name: lupin
entities.description: Professor Lupin received lukewarm applause for his work.

entities.name: kettleburn
entities.description: Kettleburn retired as the Care of Magical Creatures teacher to enjoy more time with his remaining limbs.

entities.name: hagrid
entities.description: Hagrid is taking on a new teaching job in addition to his gamekeeping duties. He was described as being ruby-red in the face.

relationships.description: Snape has loathing for Harry, which is evident from his expression every time he sees him.
Dumbledore announced Kettleburn's retirement as the Care of Magical Creatures teacher.
Dumbledore introduced Hagrid as the new Care of Magical Creatures teacher.
Harry hated Snape, which is evident from his reaction to not getting the job.
